Robert Christian https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Christian 0 Robert Christian (December 27, 1939 - January 27, 1983) was an American actor. He won an Obie Award in 1976 for his performance in Athol Fugard's Blood Knot at the Manhattan Theater Club. Robert_Christian ( December_27_,_1939 - January_27_,_1983 ) was an_American_actor . He won an_Obie_Award in 1976 for his_performance in Athol_Fugard 's_Blood_Knot at the_Manhattan_Theater_Club .
